name: One Duck 2
description:
A long time ago, NostraDamon created a game for the Ludum Dare jam 28 called One Duck. I used to play it as a time-sink, but sadly the years haven't been to kind to old One Duck :(
I tried to play the game one day after remembering it all these years later, and found a 404 page where my beloved duck game once lay.  And so I set out on a quest to restore One Duck to its former glory.

I have recreated the game from scratch, polished it slightly, and have now uploaded it here as a way to preserve a silly memory.

Thank you for visiting One Duck, I hope you have as much fun as I used to :)

Controls:
WASD                               - Move
Hold Left mouse        - Pickup duck
Release Left mouse - Throw duck
Move mouse                - Look

All idea credit goes to the original game's creator, NostraDamon. The original game can be no longer found at:
http://ludumdare.com/compo/ludum-dare-28/comment-page-3/?action=preview&uid=1321...
